name: Non science institute
description:
Non Science Institute

A surreal science text adventure game with an atmosphere of leisure.

Note: This game is originally a completed 5-chapter Chinese game that I have developed fitfully for 5 years. However, as an amateur, I would like to receive more feedback  so I decide to translate and make the first chapter of this game available here. If this game receives enough positive feedback, hopefully I will continue translating the rest of the chapters.

Originally, this game has multiple endings, however, due to time constraint, it will only one ending.

In this game, you will portray John Siu, an inventor and a scientist who seeks the power of science to help the people in need (so as to gain kudos for raising more research fund ) with your buddies. Throughout this click-and-point story, you will experience bizarre events and may discover a looming evil plan yet to be tackled... But don't worry about it, with the honor of science, use your inventions to hurdle all difficulties!
